meaningMnemonic: Imagine contorting yourself in such a way that your <radical>legs</radical> end up inside your <radical>mouth</radical>. You have bent your body in all the wrong ways in order to achieve this. In fact, if you look at yourself, you look like a square now... You're just a person with <kanji>four</kanji> sides.
readingMnemonic: This amazing feat, which turned you into a <kanji>four</kanji> sided square, has you looking like a four sided animal: the <reading>shee</reading>p (し). Look at yourself in the mirror and see an adorable four-sided sheep looking back at you. (You can't see the other sides because mirrors aren't 3D and whatnot. So you're a bit cartoonish.)
